action.sparql: ?@uniqueIduri rdf:subject | rdf:object @first . ?@uniqueIduri rdf:subject | rdf:object @last . ?@uniqueIdInst rdf:type ?@uniqueIduri . ?@uniqueIdInst <http://schema.org/evidenceLevel> ?@uniqueIdconfidence . FILTER(xsd:double(?@uniqueIdconfidence) >= @value) .

metadataType.label: tfact2gene Confidence
metadataType.sparql: WHERE {GRAPH <@graph> { ?interaction rdf:subject <@fromUri> . ?interaction rdf:object <@toUri> . ?source rdf:type ?interaction . ?source <http://schema.org/evidenceLevel> ?metadata .}} ORDER BY DESC(?metadata) LIMIT 1

metadataType.label: IntAct: Score
IntAct: Experiment Count
IntAct: Experiment Type
